actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-102.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 4250, a bill to protect the economic rights of labor in the building and construction industry by providing for equal treatment of craft and industrial workers and to establish collective bargaining procedures in the construction industry.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4250 (Labor in construction industry).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 4250, a bill to protect the economic rights of labor in the building and construction industry by providing for equal treatment of craft and industrial workers and to establish collective bargaining procedures in the construction industry.
